articles.title: Alex Jones ordered to pay $45.2 million more in punitive damages to Sandy Hook parents
articles.description: The sum is in addition to the $4.1 million Jones has been ordered to pay in compensatory damages.
articles.content:

articles.title: Israeli airstrikes in Gaza kill 10, including senior lslamic Jihad leader

articles.title: China sanctions House Speaker Nancy Pelosi over 'egregious provocation' in visit to Taiwan
